casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Kenneth BARNARD. No. 347A07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 23, 2007. Anne Bleyman, for Barnard. Daniel Johnson, Special Deputy Attorney General, Ronald L. Moore, District Attorney, for State of NC. Kimberly N. Overton, for NC Conference of DA.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th day of October 2007 by NC Association of Police Attorneys for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i). By order of the Court in conference this the 23rd day of October 2007."
